desc.p: The application ID where the entries are to be routed to an Internal Suspense Account during END.OF.DAY, when there are overrides.
Associated Multi-value field with fields with the fields DR.CATEGORY and CR.CATEGORY.

The Suspense category code to be used for Credit entries generated during EOD. If the amount to be suspended during EOD is in Credit, then the amount will be posted in an internal account in the category mentioned in this field, in the respective currency.
Valid category code in the range 10000 -19999
One account in the category mentioned in this field should be opened, for the system to post entries during EOD.
Associated Multivalue with fields SUSP.APPLN and Dr.CATEGORY
Can be the same Category code as that of Dr.CATEGORY.

The Suspense category code to be used for debit entries generated during EOD. If the amount to be posted to suspense during EOD is a debit then the amount will be posted in an internal account in the category mentioned in this field for the appropriate currency.
Valid category code in the range 10000 -19999
One account in the category mentioned in this field should be opened, for the system to post entries during EOD. Once this is done accounts in other currencies will be opened appropriately as needed.
Associated Multivalue with fields SUSP.APPLN and CR.CATEGORY
Can be the same Category code as that of CR.CATEGORY.

This table is used to route entries generated during END.OF.DAY Batch run to an Internal Suspense Account, if there are Overrides. The Applications where the Overrides are to be routed and the respective Internal account categories for Debit and Credit are mentioned in this table.
